summary.para: Retrieves the end sector of the range specified by the interface.

param.name: value
param.para: The end sector of the range.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

remarks.para: The sector number returned by this method is included in the range.

summary.para: Retrieves the start sector of the range described by .

param.name: value
param.para: The start sector of the range.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

summary.para: Use this interface to retrieve information about a single continuous range of sectors on the media. This interface is typically used together with the interface to describe a collection of sector ranges.

remarks.para: The values returned by the and methods define an inclusive range, i.e. both the start and end sectors belong to the range.
